name: ATLAScomputing
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: atlas computing
des: Anybody can get status of generally used services: Elasticsearch, Perfsonar, FTS, ... ATLAS collaboration member can set username and/or sitename and then can get status of his/her grid task and jobs, status of computing site, FTS transfers or data registered in RUCIO.
